formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: In the LLVM output, the V9 rank is 1, rather than 0, and the shape contains a one element vector containing 1. This is incorrect for a single scalar value.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The coding of the GenConst function is not sufficiently robust and requires reworking. In particular, the initial extraction of the expression values did not take into account the appropriate shape of the expression. These effects are localized and contained to the GenConst function, and do not affect any other elements or problems.

listitem.simpara: The cause of this problem can be traced at least partially back to having a function specification that is unable to express these precise details about the nature of each conversion. Adapting the function specification to include more information like this would like improve the ability to catch these errors earlier. Technically, however, these elements are clearly specified in the Programming Language Reference from Dyalog.
